Download Game!

[Introduction]
Risk your life to feed those "lovely" hungry monsters.
Feed all monsters in the level to go to next level.
Be careful and good luck!
It is a Wolfenstein3D like first person "shooting" game.

[Controls]
W/up: move forward
S/down: move back
left arrow key: turn left
A: strafe left
right arrow key: turn right
D: strafe right
----------
Space: shoot
M: map
Enter: pause game/view game status - time, level, life and score.

[About]
Developer: Bruce
Links: http://bruce-lab.blogspot.com/2011/09/full-source-code-of-game-feeder.html
